My Projects

Explore some of my recent work

Inventory Management System For Retailers

An inventory management system (or inventory system) is the process by which you track your goods throughout your entire supply chain, from purchasing to production to end sales. It governs how you approach inventory management for your business.

View Project

Gaming Tournaments Blogs

A gaming blog is a website or platform that provides information, news, reviews, and other content related to video games. It is often written and maintained by a team of gaming enthusiasts or professionals who have a passion for video games and want to share their knowledge and insights with others..

View Project

Gaming Online Store

Game Purchases: Online game stores allow users to browse and purchase digital copies of games for various platforms, such as PC, console (e.g., PlayStation, Xbox), and mobile devices. Game Downloads: Once a game is purchased, the online store provides a platform to download the game directly to the user's device

View Project

NUTRITION WEB APPLICATION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

Youniq is a US-based app, developed by company Youniq Health, that uses AI to develop an intensely personalised diet plan for its users. Rather than working towards a generalised definition of what 'healthy' means, the app caters to the individual, helping users achieve their stated goals through its suggestions

View Project
